section.p: The sails are lowered and the crew takes up oars to guide the ship through the narrow fissure. The pilot stands in the bow with the lead line in his hand, constantly taking soundings. The Uttakin guide their own ships safely into harbour using overhead cables, but foreign captains must take their chances.
